they 're having fun on the dace floor .

output.sentences: My sister's second wedding was a lot of fun, especially watching the kids dancing.
All of the furniture had been pushed aside for the anticipated fun and so we could all dance.
The theme was spring flowers and the kids all wore cool necklaces.
The wedding was great and afterwards we all met the relatives from both sides.
One girl in particular seemed to be having a lot of fun dancing, even when no one was partnering her.
